text: Marcel Flückiger (20 June 1929 – 27 November 2010) was a Swiss football player. He played as a defender. Flückiger played for Switzerland in the 1954 FIFA World Cup.Copa do Mundo da FIFA Suíça 1954 He also played for BSC Young Boys. Flückiger died on 27 November 2010 in Bern, Switzerland at the age of 81. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1929 births Category:2010 deaths Category:Swiss footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:1954 FIFA World Cup players Category:Sportspeople from Bern
title: Marcel Flückiger
